channel.title: Lego on Writing by Harper Reed
channel.description: Recent content in Lego on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: today
item.description: today was strange. I slept in too long. I have been playing quak eand legos. both of which cause me to stay up far far too late. it sucks. I ended up sleeping at around 4:00. but whatever. my crane is almost done. ha. Recently the Honerary Mentions for the Prix Ars Electronica 2002. My competition was fierce. click here to have your mind blown. Oh, and I went to hooters for lunch.
